title: A disappointed friend
Disappointment
Disappointment

en: It's like I don't know you any more? I feel like I've been making all the effort to keep our friendship going. I'm cheesed-off, seriously.
Where the heck have you been? I feel like I've been making all the effort to keep our friendship going. You have to step it up, okay?

yes_caption: Sorry pal, I'll try to be more responsive.
no_caption: Yeah, well, I've been busy. Give me a break.

en: none::Juggling friendships with work is hard, but you've decided it's worth it.
none::You can't afford the luxury of socializing right now. You hope he'll understand.
